# Trainer API

The Trainer is developed in a separate [GitHub
repository](https://github.com/idiap/coqui-ai-Trainer) and released as PyPI
package [`coqui-tts-trainer`](https://pypi.org/project/coqui-tts-trainer).

```{eval-rst}
    :members:
```
